pages.text: Galactic Drive's Wiki contains thorough information on the Solar System present in the modpack. Ore Distributions, Mob Spawning, and general planet information are all here.$(br2)All changelogs are present on the Wiki as well.
Click the link below to access the Wiki.$(br2)Make sure to check here first before asking on Discord!.$(br2) $(br2)           ⇩ ⇩ ⇩
